  • Register
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
Password incorrect.
We'll never share your email with anyone else.
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login-signup', templateUrl: './login-signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login-signup.component.css'] }) export class LoginSignupComponent { // Login Data loginData = { email: '', password: '' }; loginFailed = false; // Register Data registerData = { fullName: '', username: '', email: '', password: '', confirmPassword: '' }; // Login Submit Handler onLoginSubmit() { // Hier könntest du eine API-Anfrage machen if (this.loginData.email === 'test@example.com' && this.loginData.password === 'password123') { console.log('Login successful'); this.loginFailed = false; } else { this.loginFailed = true; } } // Register Submit Handler onRegisterSubmit() { // Hier kannst du die Registrierung verarbeiten und prüfen, ob die Passwörter übereinstimmen if (this.registerData.password === this.registerData.confirmPassword) { console.log('Registration successful'); } else { console.log('Passwords do not match'); } } }
